short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Notepad for text editing, making notes, memos, or just any plain text content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write notes, ideas or to-do lists, plain text, or any other important information quickly and easily.

This notepad is made very simple without various features and free from distractions, so you focus on taking notes in this notepad.

Shortcut: press Alt+N

We hope this notepad is useful and can help you.

Thank you for using our chrome extension.
